articles.author: Charlotte Everett
articles.title: Made In Chelsea's Sophie Habboo forced to deny pregnancy after NTAs appearance - The Mirror
articles.description: Sophie Habboo has hit back at people asking if she's pregnant after her appearance on the NTA red carpet
articles.content:
Sophie Habboo has been forced to deny that she's pregnant following her National Television Awards red carpet appearance. 
 The Made In Chelsea star has hit back at those who have sent her multiple … [+2782 chars]
